licenseExceptionText:
As a special exception, you have permission to link this library
with the CGAL library (http://www.cgal.org) and distribute executables,
as long as you follow the requirements of the GNU GPL in regard to
all of the software in the executable aside from CGAL.
name: CGAL Linking Exception
licenseExceptionTemplate: As a special exception, you have permission to link this <<var;name="program";original="program";match="program|library">> with the CGAL library<<beginOptional>> (http://www.cgal.org)<<endOptional>> and distribute executables, as long as you follow the requirements of the GNU GPL in regard to all of the software in the executable aside from CGAL.
exceptionTextHtml: As a special exception, you have permission to link this program with the CGAL library (http://www.cgal.org) and distribute executables, as long as you follow the requirements of the GNU GPL in regard to all of the software in the executable aside from CGAL.
